messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Ungroup meeting
messages.msgSnippet: Yes, thank you Shyrley! It was great meeting folks. And Eric was a big help getting Jason set up with Spyro and helping him figure it out. :o) Also a big help
messages.messageBody:
Yes, thank you Shyrley! It was great meeting folks. And Eric was a big help getting
Jason set up with Spyro and helping him figure it out. :o) Also a big help to me,
since I got to stay a bit longer! How long did you guys wind up staying? I left
around 3:30 I think.

Stephanie E.

>

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Ungroup meeting
messages.msgSnippet: Your un group sounds absolutely terrific!!! Suzanne ... From: GDobes@aol.com To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com Sent: Wednesday, January 15, 2003 12:30
messages.messageBody:
Your "un group" sounds absolutely terrific!!!

Suzanne
----- Original Message -----
From: GDobes@...
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, January 15, 2003 12:30 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Ungroup meeting


In a message dated 01/15/2003 9:28:15 AM Eastern Standard Time,
shyrley.williams@... writes:

>
> We had a nice time yesterday at our unschooling ungroup. Ginny came 2 hours
> to get too my house!!
>
It was worth the trip. Carly and I enjoyed chatting at the table with
"y'all". Once Eric relaxes, he'll join in. It just takes him a while. It took
longer to get home. I took the wrong Rt 15 exit off 29S. I hate driving in
the dark. It started snowing too. Gorgeous. Typical VA though; it's almost
gone.
When it gets warmer, we'll open up our home to everyone. We're surrounded by
lots of woods plus have a pool.
Ginny

>Earthmomma67@... wrote:
>

> > Well, after a shower actually.
> > *~*Elissa Jill*~*
>
>Sure. I'm not doing anything. House looks like a tornado passed through it.

Me, of course! ....But, I can't find the keys to my private jet. I know I
left them right here on the counter... Wait, maybe they fell off into this
basket. No.... I'm going to check between the sofa cushions. I'm mean, I
just saw them a couple of days ago! Grrrrr. I'll have to get back to you.

~Marji ;-) (wishing I could come to your house and spend the afternoon)

messages.messageBody:
We had a nice time yesterday at our unschooling ungroup. Ginny came 2 hours to get too my house!!
Kids played, we ate snacks, we gazed out of the window for Elissa......

Shyrley
